glsa.title: OpenTTD: Format string vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: OpenTTD is vulnerable to format string vulnerabilities which may result in remote execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: OpenTTD is an open source clone of the simulation game "Transport Tycoon Deluxe" by Microprose.

description.p: Alexey Dobriyan discovered several format string vulnerabilities in OpenTTD.

impact.p: A remote attacker could exploit these vulnerabilities to crash the OpenTTD server or client and possibly execute arbitrary code with the rights of the user running OpenTTD.

workaround.p: There are no known workarounds at this time.

resolution.p: All OpenTTD users should upgrade to the latest version:
